newsitem.title: USA: Mellon to acquire First United Leasing. [CORRECTED]
newsitem.headline: Mellon to acquire First United Leasing. [CORRECTED]

text.p: Mellon Bank Corp said on Monday it would acquire First United Leasing Corp by the early fourth quarter.

The deal, expected to simutaneously add $150 million to Mellon's (Corrects from First United's) assets as well as increase its total leasing portfolio, was reached through definitive agreement, becoming Mellon's second acquisition announcement this month.
Both acquisitions would bring an estimated $2.3 billion to Mellon's coffers.
First United Leasing is a Chicago-based vendor leasing company and Mellon Bank is a financial service company headquartered in Pittsburgh.
Terms of the agreement were not disclosed.
